html:
2025-0659
2025-09-16AAFC, FINAgricultural Marketing Programs ActRegulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (Canola 2025 and 2026)Regulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (Canola 2025 and 2026) in order to temporarily increase the Advance Payments Program (APP)’s interest-free limit to $500,000, that is to say the portion of advances that the Government pays the interest on, for canola advances, for the 2025 and 2026 program years.Registration: SOR/2025-0188 Publication Date: 2025-10-08
subject: Regulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (Canola 2025 and 2026)
precis: Regulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (Canola 2025 and 2026) in order to temporarily increase the Advance Payments Program (APP)’s interest-free limit to $500,000, that is to say the portion of advances that the Government pays the interest on, for canola advances, for the 2025 and 2026 program years.
